p: You can now export Shepard's® reports to Microsoft Excel. By delivering Shepard’s reports in Excel format, you can take advantage of that application’s features to manipulate those reports and the up to 10,000 citing referenced available each report. Please note that only Shepard's reports can be exported to Excel. If you choose this option, BriefCheck will clear other services.

Some the advantages of exporting to Excel include the ability to sort by column. You can sort on the Date column so that the most recent citing decisions bubble to the top. Or take advantage of multiple sort keys to:
You can also filter the delivered Shepard’s reports since you can filter on any of the available columns in Excel. You can filter by:

li: Group the citing decisions by Court
Sort within each Court by the way the citing decisions treat your case (e.g., Warning, Questioned, Caution, Positive).
Search within columns for specific words or phrases
Specific Courts at a more granular level than available online
Shepard’s Signal Indicator (e.g., only those with a red signal)
Section of the report (e.g., view only the Appellate History portion of the reports)
